fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Simmons & Simmons LLP monitors EU initiatives, policies and legislative files in a number of areas, including financial regulation, corporate law, intellectual property law, competition, internal market, digital single market, healthcare, energy and environmental law.
membership: Law Society, British Chamber of Commerce, multiple national bar associations, European Competition Lawyers Forum, IBA
goals__remit: Simmons & Simmons LLP is an international law firm, with 18 offices in Europe, the Middle East and Asia. Simmons & Simmons applies considerable expertise to all business sectors but focuses on: asset management and investment funds, financial institutions, life sciences and technology, media and telecommunications (TMT). It also focuses on the energy and infrastructure market.
relevant_communication:
In 2014, Simmons & Simmons LLP submitted on its own behalf a response to the consultation on DG Competition’s White Paper: “Towards more effective EU merger control”. 
 
In 2017, Simmons & Simmons LLP submitted on its own behalf a response to the European Commission's Consultation on Evaluation of procedural and jurisdictional aspects of EU merger control.
